'''Heron Carvic''' ([[21 January|January 21]], [[1913]] - [[9 February|February 9]], [[1980]]) was the voice of [[Gandalf]] in ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'' radio adaptation broadcast on BBC Radio 4.
